TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingAnnotationCollection extends System.Collections.Generic.List`1<string>

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
As anotações são `strings` definir que contêm informações para associar a determinados tipos de dados de rastreamento. Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, ou <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection> é inicializada com uma lista vazia.

Docs.summary: Inicializa uma nova instância do classe usando uma lista de anotações de cadeia de caracteres.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection> é inicializada para conter as cadeias de caracteres especificadas em `annotations`.
